mention.text: the Exxon Valdez -- violating both Coast Guard regulations and company policy -- when the tanker crashed into rocks , unleashing the worst oil spill in U.S. history
the oil company with the deep pockets
Prince William Sound a disaster area
reporters that Capt. Joseph Hazelwood was one flight below the bridge in his cabin when the Exxon Valdez hit the first jagged rock pinnacle about a mile outside shipping lanes
the 42-year-old captain to go below to use the bathroom or get coffee , since both are available on the bridge
Cousins , a three-year employee of Exxon
the captain , helmsman and third mate
Otter experts from Hubbs Marine Research Institute at Sea World in San Diego
the Interior representative assessing the situation
spokeswoman for the state Department of Environmental Conservation
tons and tons of its own equipment
